projects.title: HangIt
projects.description: HanGit is an interactive app, using the Hangman game as a model to help developers learn git commands. HanGit will help beginners with Git    and Github in an interactive game format.

projects.title: Salmon Cookies
projects.description: Salmon Cookies, is a proof of concept application to calculate the number of cookies each location must make every day so that it can manage its supplies inventory and baking schedule. The number of cookies to make depends on the hours of operation, and a few factors unique to each location. Additionally, new store locations can be added

projects.title: Build an Android App w/JAVA
projects.description: One of the first apps I was working on my internship. I had to develop front-end implementation for app that shows 3D models of known buildings. This was also my first project in Angular framework. I've learned a lot!
